fullplot: A family is cursed by their goddess because of a sin made by a person, Every 48 years a person gets killed. Sabari who saw the killings of her father, and her husband makes an ultimate sacrifice to save her grandson.
plot: A family is cursed by their goddess because of a sin made by a person, Every 48 years a person gets killed. Sabari who saw the killings of her father, and her husband makes an ultimate sacrifice to save her grandson.
title: Murari

tomatoes.consensus: A poorly-made Scottish thriller that suffers from bad cinematography, let-down performances and a distinct lack of thrills.
